channel.title: startup on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in startup on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Founder Liquidity
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Ask most venture-backed founders why they get 10x more equity than employee #1, 100x more equity than employee #5, and 1000x more equity than employee #15, and you’ll get the same answer: “I’M TAKING SO MUCH RISK, IT’S SO HARD TO START A COMPANY, I MADE A BIG MOVE!

item.title: A Holistic Guide to Security
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Security is no longer just a technical concern—it’s a core component of client trust. When our team launched a new collaboration tool, we quickly realized this.

item.title: Lean Canvas
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lean Canvas Lean Canvas is an adaptation of Business Model Canvas by Alexander Osterwalder which Ash Maurya created in the Lean Startup spirit (Fast, Concise and Effective startup).

item.title: Building a community platform for Vietnamese Entrepreneurs
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry Startup Community / Knowledge Sharing Location Vietnam Business context Vietnamese entrepreneurs needed a central platform to connect, share experiences, and find resources for their businesses

item.title: Building AI-powered search for online stores
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry E-commerce Technology Location United States / Global Business context AI search startup needed to enhance their platform and developer tools

item.title: Dwarves Ventures Fund 1
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It all started back in 2019 when a handful of tech people came under the name of Dwarves Ventures, with the sole mission was to give force to makers and hustlers.

item.title: Creating the first platform for Executive assistants
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry Productivity / Workplace Software Location United States Business context Executive assistants lacked specialized software to manage calendars, tasks, and communication across multiple platforms

item.title: Dwarves Ventures Fund 0
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It all started when us, a couple of product people realized with our expertise in technology, our passion for outstanding software, we have the ability to uplift like-minded founders by helping them build and launch their startups.

item.title: Making dental work easier in Singapore
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry Healthcare / Dental Services Location Singapore Business context Dentists needed a centralized platform to manage events, find staff, and order supplies
